subject: Update parse_elevenlabs_data to extract integration_context resolved IDs
description:
Task 1.1: Updated parse_elevenlabs_data code node to extract assigned_to_id, business_unit_id, campaign_id from integration_context alongside existing field_mappings pattern. Three-tier fallback: integration_context.{field} -> mapValue(field_mappings) -> null.

Evidence:
- `tests/code-nodes/st-call-association/parse-elevenlabs-data.js:73`: `const assignedToId = integrationContext.assigned_to_id ?? null;`
- `tests/code-nodes/st-call-association/parse-elevenlabs-data.js:74`: `const integrationBusinessUnitId = integrationContext.business_unit_id ?? null;`
- `tests/code-nodes/st-call-association/parse-elevenlabs-data.js:75`: `const campaignId = integrationContext.campaign_id ?? null;`
- `tests/code-nodes/st-call-association/parse-elevenlabs-data.js:104`: `const businessUnitId = integrationBusinessUnitId ?? mappedBusinessUnitId;`
- `tests/code-nodes/st-call-association/parse-elevenlabs-data.js:136`: `assignedToId,`
- `tests/code-nodes/st-call-association/parse-elevenlabs-data.js:137`: `campaignId,`
- Verification: `bunx vitest run` - 195 tests passed, 0 regressions
